properties.name: subject
properties.description: The subject of the activity to create

properties.description: Whether the activity is done or not

properties.description: Type of the activity like "call", "meeting", etc

options.description: ID of the deal this activity will be associated with

options.name: due_date
options.description: Due Date to activity be done YYYY-MM-DD

options.name: note
options.description: Note of the activity (HTML format)

options.description: ID of the organization this activity will be associated with. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: person_id
options.description: ID of the person this activity will be associated with

options.name: user_id
options.description: ID of the active user whom the activity will be assigned to. If omitted, the activity will be assigned to the authorized user. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.description: Adds a custom property to set also values which have not been predefined

options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: lost_reason
options.description: Reason why the deal was lost

options.name: org_id
options.description: ID of the organization this deal will be associated with

options.name: person_id
options.description: ID of the person this deal will be associated with

options.name: probability
options.description: Deal success probability percentage

options.name: stage_id
options.description: ID of the stage this deal will be placed in a pipeline. If omitted, the deal will be placed in the first stage of the default pipeline. (PIPELINE > STAGE). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: status
options.description: The status of the deal. If not provided it will automatically be set to "open".

options.name: user_id
options.description: ID of the active user whom the activity will be assigned to. If omitted, the activity will be assigned to the authorized user. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: value
options.description: Value of the deal. If not set it will automatically be set to 0.

options.name: visible_to
options.description: Visibility of the deal. If omitted, visibility will be set to the default visibility setting of this item type for the authorized user.

properties.description: The ID of the deal to add a product to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.description: How many items of this product to add/update in a deal

options.description: ID of the product variation to use

properties.name: dealId
properties.description: The ID of the deal whose product to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: productAttachmentId
properties.description: ID of the deal-product (the ID of the product attached to the deal). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: comments
options.description: Text to describe this product-deal attachment

options.name: discount_percentage
options.description: Percentage of discount to apply

options.description: Price at which to add or update this product in a deal

properties.name: dealId
properties.description: The ID of the deal whose product to remove. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: productAttachmentId
properties.description: ID of the deal-product (the ID of the product attached to the deal). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: dealId
properties.description: The ID of the deal whose products to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: term
properties.description: The search term to look for. Minimum 2 characters (or 1 if using exact_match).

properties.name: exactMatch
properties.description: Whether only full exact matches against the given term are returned. It is not case sensitive.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: includeFields
options.description: Supports including optional fields in the results which are not provided by default. Example: deal.cc_email.

options.name: organizationId
options.description: Will filter Deals by the provided Organization ID

options.name: personId
options.description: Will filter Deals by the provided Person ID

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated string array. The fields to perform the search from. Defaults to all of them.

options.name: status
options.description: The status of the deal. If not provided it will automatically be set to "open".

properties.name: resolveProperties
properties.description: By default do custom properties get returned only as ID instead of their actual name. Also option fields contain only the ID instead of their actual value. If this option gets set they get automatically resolved.

properties.name: encodeProperties
properties.description: By default do custom properties have to be set as ID instead of their actual name. Also option fields have to be set as ID instead of their actual value. If this option gets set they get automatically encoded.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: dealId
properties.description: The ID of the deal whose activity to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: done
options.description: Whether the activity is done or not

options.name: exclude
options.description: A comma-separated Activity IDs, to exclude from result. Ex. 4, 9, 11, ...

options.name: firstChar
options.description: If supplied, only organizations whose name starts with the specified letter will be returned

options.name: filterId
options.description: ID of the filter to use. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: filterId
options.description: ID of the filter to use. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: firstChar
options.description: If supplied, only persons whose name starts with the specified letter will be returned

options.name: sort
options.description: The field names and sorting mode separated by a comma (field_name_1 ASC, field_name_2 DESC). Only first-level field keys are supported (no nested keys).

properties.name: term
properties.description: The search term to look for. Minimum 2 characters (or 1 if using exact_match).

options.name: exactMatch
options.description: Whether only full exact matches against the given term are returned. It is not case sensitive.

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated string array. The fields to perform the search from. Defaults to all of them.

options.name: includeFields
options.description: Supports including optional fields in the results which are not provided by default

options.name: organizationId
options.description: Will filter Deals by the provided Organization ID

options.name: rawData
options.description: Whether to return the data exactly in the way it got received from the API

options.name: deal_id
options.description: ID of the deal this note will be associated with

options.name: lead_id
options.description: ID of the lead this note will be associated with

options.name: org_id
options.description: ID of the organization this deal will be associated with. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: person_id
options.description: ID of the person this note will be associated with

options.name: done
options.description: Whether the Activity is done or not. 0 = Not done, 1 = Done. If omitted returns both Done and Not done activities.

options.name: end_date
options.description: Use the Activity due date where you wish to stop fetching Activities from. Insert due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

options.name: filterId
options.description: The ID of the Filter to use (will narrow down results if used together with user_id parameter). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: start_date
options.description: Use the Activity due date where you wish to begin fetching Activities from. Insert due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

options.name: type
options.description: Type of the Activity. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: user_id
options.description: The ID of the User whose Activities will be fetched. If omitted, the User associated with the API token will be used. If 0, Activities for all company Users will be fetched based on the permission sets. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: filter_id
options.description: Predefined filter to apply to the deals to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: stage_id
options.description: ID of the stage to filter deals by. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: status
options.description: Status to filter deals by. Defaults to all_not_deleted

options.name: user_id
options.description: ID of the user to filter deals by. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

name: n8n-nodes-base.pipedrive
